name: Brigands and Barbarians RPG
blurb: Brigands and Barbarians is an indie RPG for iPad with a heavy emphasis on cartography and puzzles.

rewards.reward: TIP JAR\r\nYour way of saying keep working on this app, I support you as much as I would support somebody who made an awesome sub, burrito, or coffee.

EARLY BIRD gets the APP - The first five backers at this level can choose a free copy of the iPhone or iPad app.  The will get this reward immediately even if the project is not successfully funded.  Just our way of getting the party started.

SUPPORTER - APP BRIGANDS Our deepest thanks for your support, you will receive all backer updates.  Unleash the Brigands and unleash the iPad version for free for three days after the Kickstarter ends successfully and payments are processed.  Backers at this level and above will be messaged when the app is available for free.  Remember you will get all the new content in free updates to the current app!

SUPPORTER - iPad APP SCOUT This is everything in the Barbarian reward tier, plus Early Bird Gets the App!  That is right you get the app for iPad right now and the following:

The Bards will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates.  In addition your name will be enshrined as a Defender of Charedon on our website. Remember you will get all the new content in free updates to the current app!

Backers at this level and above will also receive a PDF rulebook for Brigands and Barbarians HD.

SUPPORTER - iPad APP BARBARIAN The Bards will sing your praises!  You will receive all backer updates and a copy of Brigands and Barbarians HD for the iPad.  In addition your name will be enshrined as a Defender of Charedon on our website.

Remember you will get all the new content in free updates to the current app!  And you will get the current app after the project ends and the payments have been processed.

Backers at this level and above will also receive a PDF rulebook for Brigands and Barbarians HD.

SUPPORTER - iPad APP WIZARD The Bards will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates and a copy of Brigands and Barbarians HD for the iPad. 

In addition your name will be enshrined as a Knight of Charedon on our website.  Your name will be in the game credits and in the PDF rulebook as a Knight of Charedon.

Also you can choose a male or female fantasy name to be added to our random in game Avatar name generator.  You favorite avatar name in game!

SUPPORTER - APP SORCERESS

You get to choose a new avatar for us to add to the game, perhaps this takes the app in a new direction Futuristic or Steam Punk (note no overused Zombies, Sparkle Vampires, or other offensive avatars we have our limits).

The Bards will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates and a copy of Brigands and Barbarians HD for the iPad. In addition your name will be enshrined as a Knight of Charedon on our website. Your name will be in the game credits and in the PDF rulebook as a Knight of Charedon.

SUPPORTER - CREATOR

The Bards will sing your praises! Heck I will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates and a copy of Brigands and Barbarians HD for the iPad. In addition your name will be enshrined as a Champion of Charedon on our website. Your name will be in the game credits and in the PDF rulebook as a Champion of Charedon.

Creators can choose a special creature they would like to see added to the game, yes even zombies or undead cows.

SUPPORTER - Executive Producer - The Bards will sing your praises! Heck I will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates and Your name will be enshrined as an Executive Producer on our website. Your name will be in the game credits and in the PDF rulebook as an Executive Producer.  The opportunity to write a forward to the rulebook if you desire.  This is a vote of confidence that the iPad is your platform of choice for this game.\r\n\r\nNew Avatar Profession - You get to choose a new avatar for us to add to the game, perhaps this takes the app in a new direction Futuristic or Steam Punk (note no overused Zombies, Sparkle Vampires, or other offensive avatars we have our limits).  Executive Producer has the option to make the iPad app free for a week if the Kickstarter is successful.

SUPPORTER - Platform of Choice - The Bards will sing your praises! Heck I will sing your praises! You will receive all backer updates and Your name will be enshrined as an Executive Producer on our website. Your name will be in the game credits and in the PDF rulebook as an Executive Producer.  The opportunity to write a forward to the rulebook if you desire.  And you will enable us to bring Brigands and Barbarians HD to any of the following platforms your choice:  Windows 8 App Store, Surface, Kindle Tablets, Windows 7, Steam Box, X-Box Live Indie Games, or Mac.  Executive Producer has the option to make the iPad app free for a week if the Kickstarter is successful.
